ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Recall context for survey
Notes: e.g., ''Thinking of your entire lifetime'' or ''Since April 1, 2020''

ElementDescription: Have you ever smoked cigarettes or used any other kind of tobacco, including e-cigarettes, on a regular basis in your life?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Ever smoked cigarettes or tobacco on a regular basis - Was that tobacco cigarettes, other kinds of tobacco, or e-cigarettes? (Cigarettes)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Ever smoked cigarettes or tobacco on a regular basis - Was that tobacco cigarettes, other kinds of tobacco, or e-cigarettes? (Other tobacco)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Ever smoked cigarettes or tobacco on a regular basis - Was that tobacco cigarettes, other kinds of tobacco, or e-cigarettes? (E-cigarettes)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Ever smoked cigarettes or tobacco on a regular basis - Was that tobacco cigarettes, other kinds of tobacco, or e-cigarettes? (Do not know)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Ever smoked cigarettes or tobacco on a regular basis - Was that tobacco cigarettes, other kinds of tobacco, or e-cigarettes? (No answer)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: At about what age did you first smoke tobacco cigarettes or use tobacco on a regular basis? (Do NOT include e-cigarettes.)
Notes: Age in years; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you smoked tobacco cigarettes or used any other kinds of tobacco? (Do NOT include e-cigarettes.)
Notes: 1 = Daily or nearly daily; 2 = 1-4 days per week; 3 = Once every 2-3 weeks; 4 = Once every month or so; 5 = Less often than that; 6 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you used e-cigarettes?
Notes: 1 = Daily or nearly daily; 2 = 1-4 days per week; 3 = Once every 2-3 weeks; 4 = Once every month or so; 5 = Less often than that; 6 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: On the days that you smoke, how many tobacco cigarettes do you smoke each day on average? (Do NOT include e-cigarettes.)
Notes: Number of cigarettes; 996=Less than 1 per day; 999=No answer

ElementDescription: At the time in your life that you smoked or used tobacco most heavily, how often did you use it? (Do NOT include e-cigarettes.)
Notes: 1 = Daily or nearly daily; 2 = 1-4 days per week; 3 = Once every 2-3 weeks; 4 = Once every month or so; 5 = Less often than that; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: How long ago (in years, months, and weeks) was the last time you smoked tobacco cigarettes or used any other kinds of tobacco? Weeks
Notes: Number of weeks; 99= No answer

ElementDescription: How long ago (in years, months, and weeks) was the last time you smoked tobacco cigarettes or used any other kinds of tobacco? Months
Notes: Number of months; 99= No answer

ElementDescription: How long ago (in years, months, and weeks) was the last time you smoked tobacco cigarettes or used any other kinds of tobacco? Years
Notes: Number of years; 99= No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you used marijuana, hashish, pot, THC or ''weed''?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less often than that; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often did you use alcohol and marijuana at the same time?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less than once every month or two; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Do you have a medical recommendation from a doctor for marijuana or cannabis?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Have you ever used marijuana at any time in your life?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you used a prescription pain reliever such as Codeine, Percodan, Vicodin, OxyContin, or Methadone in any way a doctor did not direct you to use it?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less often than that; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often did you use alcohol and prescription pain relievers at the same time?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less than once every month or two; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Have you used any other prescription drugs in any way a doctor did not direct you to use them?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you used any prescription stimulants or uppers such as amphetamines, Ritalin, or Adderall in any way a doctor did not direct you to use them?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less often than that; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often did you use alcohol and prescription stimulants at the same time?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less than every month or two; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you used prescription tranquilizers like benzodiazepines, Xanax, Ativan, Klonopin, or Valium or sedatives like barbiturates, Ambien, -zapams or phenobarbital in any way a doctor did not direct you to use them?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less often than that; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often did you use alcohol and tranquilizers or sedatives at the same time?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less than once every month or two; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you used any other drugs for recreational purposes?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less often than that; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you used cocaine or crack cocaine?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less often than that; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often did you use alcohol and cocaine or crack cocaine at the same time?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less than once every month or two; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often have you used heroin?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less often than that; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often did you use alcohol and heroin at the same time?
Notes: 0 = Every day or nearly every day; 1 = About once a week; 2 = Once every 2 or 3 weeks; 3 = Once every month or two; 4 = Less than once every month or two; 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Have you gotten into a heated argument while using drugs?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Have you felt that your drug use was becoming a serious threat to your physical health?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Have you lost time from work because of your drug use?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Have you tried but failed to control, cut down, or stop using drugs?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Do not know; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Have you smoked cigarettes or used any other kind of tobacco, including e-cigarettes, on a regular basis since April 1, 2020?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 99 = No answer
